009package PointOperations;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.WindowManager;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramMatcher;
018import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
019import imagingbook.common.histogram.Util;
020
021/**
022 * Adapts image intensities to match the histogram of another image.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * 
026 * @see HistogramMatcher
027 * @see HistogramPlot
028 *
029 */
030public class Match_To_Image_Histogram implements PlugInFilter { 
031        
032        ImagePlus imB;  // reference image (selected interactively)
033        
034        @Override
035        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imA) {
036                return DOES_8G;
037        }
038        
039        @Override
040        public void run(ImageProcessor ipA) {
041                if (!runDialog() || imB == null) // select the reference image
042                        return;
043                
044                ImageProcessor ipB = imB.getProcessor();
045                
046                // get histograms of both images
047                int[] hA = ipA.getHistogram();
048                int[] hB = ipB.getHistogram();
049                (new HistogramPlot(hA, "Histogram A")).show();
050                (new HistogramPlot(hB, "Histogram B")).show();
051                (new HistogramPlot(Util.Cdf(hA), "Cumulative Histogram A")).show();
052                (new HistogramPlot(Util.Cdf(hB), "Cumulative Histogram B")).show();
053                
054                HistogramMatcher m = new HistogramMatcher();
055                int[] F = m.matchHistograms(hA, hB);
056                
057//              for (int i = 0; i < F.length; i++) {
058//                      IJ.log(i + " -> " + F[i]);
059//              }
060                
061                ipA.applyTable(F);
062                int[] hAm = ipA.getHistogram();
063                (new HistogramPlot(hAm, "Histogram A (mod)")).show();
064                (new HistogramPlot(Util.Cdf(hAm), "Cumulative Histogram A (mod)")).show();
065        }
066
067        boolean runDialog() {
068                // get list of open images
069                // TODO: use IjUtils.getOpenImages (as in Linear_Blending)
070                int[] windowList = WindowManager.getIDList();
071                if(windowList==null){
072                        IJ.noImage();
073                        return false;
074                }
075                // get image titles
076                String[] windowTitles = new String[windowList.length];
077                for (int i = 0; i < windowList.length; i++) {
078                        ImagePlus imp = WindowManager.getImage(windowList[i]);
079                        if (imp != null)
080                                windowTitles[i] = imp.getShortTitle();
081                        else
082                                windowTitles[i] = "untitled";
083                }
084                // create dialog and show
085                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Select Reference Image");
086                gd.addChoice("Reference Image:", windowTitles, windowTitles[0]);
087                
088                gd.showDialog(); 
089                if (gd.wasCanceled()) 
090                        return false;
091                
092                int img2Index = gd.getNextChoiceIndex();
093                imB = WindowManager.getImage(windowList[img2Index]);
094                return true;
095        }
096
097}
098
